abstract: Digital sub-channels have not exactly been raving successes. So the broadcasters would love to find something else to do with their additional spectrum. One solution may soon appear next year in the form of mobile television technology, a system that will allow you to watch digital TV while you’re on the move, using a PDA, cell phone, or your laptop.

lead_paragraph: One benefit of the transition to digital broadcasting is that, thanks to compression technologies, multiple channels can be transmitted in the space previously needed for just one.
